book.runology.guidebook.name: Runic Codex
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.discover: I feel a strange and mysterious force... For whatever reason, I feel as if I should imbue a book with this power.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.gu: After imbuing that strange power into a book, I have obtained powerful knowledge, this path, it may lead me to power! However... I can't help but wonder... What is that voice in my head telling me all of this?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: These holes in space appear to lead to somewhere else, while I may not be able to cross them, I may be able to extract energy from them. I will call this energy "Shattered Flow"
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ba: There are 4 runes I can utilize to manipulate the world: [#](ff5d00)Heat[#](), [#](00d1ff)Frost[#](), [#](00ff00)Shape[#]() and [#](ffd100)Motion[#](). Utilizing these 4 is powerful but there has to be more...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: This stone... I have never seen it before however after discovering a shatter, I have started seeing it everywhere in caves... Is there more to this world than what I can see?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ru: While I know about runes, I do not have a method to create them, a Runic Chisel will work, to obtain one, I will have to imbue a gold chisel with Shattered Flow.
